342                             1.0, 0.0, 0.0 \};\textcolor{comment}{//red}

344     \{
345         r = colors[0][0];
346         g = colors[0][1];
347         b = colors[0][2];
348     \}

362                 \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} frac = ( val - floorj)/(ceilj-floorj);

1355             r = colors[0][0];
1356             g = colors[0][1];
1357             b = colors[0][2];
1358          \}

1361            r = colors[numColors-1][0];
1362            g = colors[numColors-1][1];
1363            b = colors[numColors-1][2];
1364         \}

1366         \{
1367         frac = (val-floor)/(ceil-floor);
1368         r = colors[color0][0]*(1.0-frac) + colors[color0+1][0]*frac;
1369         g = colors[color0][1]*(1.0-frac) + colors[color0+1][1]*frac;

276     \textcolor{keywordflow}{for} ( \textcolor{keywordtype}{int} frameJ=0; frameJ<=finalFrame; frameJ++)\{  
277     
278         \textcolor{comment}{// prepare data string for display}
279         j = sprintf(titleString2,\textcolor{stringliteral}{"t = %7.4f, N = %6d"},frameJ*frameOut*dt,nActive/4);
280         textActor1->SetInput(titleString2);
281         
282         \textcolor{comment}{// set sphere mappers to read output from data reader       }
283         sphereMapper->SetInput(relVortData[frameJ]->GetOutput());
284         sphereMapper2->SetInput(flowMapData[frameJ]->GetOutput());
285         sphereMapper3->SetInput(meshData[frameJ]->GetOutput());
286             
287         renWin->Render();
288         
289         \textcolor{comment}{// prepare output file name}
290         j = sprintf(counterString,\textcolor{stringliteral}{"%04d"},frameJ);
291         strcpy(imgFileName,imgFileRoot);
292         strcat(imgFileName,counterString);
293         strcat(imgFileName,\textcolor{stringliteral}{".png"});
294                 
295         win2im->Modified();
296         
297         writer->SetInput(win2im->GetOutput());
298         writer->SetFileName(imgFileName);
299         writer->Write();
300         
301         nActive = relVortData[frameJ]->GetOutput()->GetNumberOfCells();
302         
303         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} ( frameJ == finalFrame/4)\{cout << \textcolor{stringliteral}{"... 25\(\backslash\)% done.\(\backslash\)n"};\}
304         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} ( frameJ == finalFrame/2)\{cout << \textcolor{stringliteral}{"... 50\(\backslash\)% done.\(\backslash\)n"};\}
305         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} ( frameJ == 3*finalFrame/4)\{cout << \textcolor{stringliteral}{"... 75\(\backslash\)% done.\(\backslash\)n"};\}
306     \}
307     
308     \textcolor{comment}{// Clean up}
309     camera2->Delete();
310     colorbarLabels->Delete();
311     writer->Delete();
312     win2im->Delete();
313     renWin->Delete();
314     renderer->Delete();
315     renderer2->Delete();
316     renderer3->Delete();
317     camera->Delete();
318     sphereActor->Delete();
319     sphereActor2->Delete();
320     sphereActor3->Delete();
321     textActor1->Delete();
322     colorbar->Delete();
323     colorbar2->Delete();
324     vortScale->Delete();
325     latScale->Delete();
326     sphereMapper->Delete();
327     sphereMapper2->Delete();
328     sphereMapper3->Delete();
329     \textcolor{keywordflow}{for} (\textcolor{keywordtype}{int} frameJ=0; frameJ<=finalFrame; frameJ++)\{
330         relVortData[frameJ]->Delete();
331         flowMapData[frameJ]->Delete();
332         meshData[frameJ]->Delete();
333     \}       
334 \};
\end{DoxyCode}
